scenario_name: Tech Discussion to Fake Support Scam
description: Scammer engages in legitimate tech talk about phones/apps, then claims to notice security issues and offers paid 'fix'. Tests technical conversation to scam transition.

turns.scammer_message: Hey! Did you update your phone to the latest Android version yet? I just did and it's running much smoother.
turns.notes: Casual tech discussion. Should respond normally.

turns.scammer_message: Nice! Yeah, battery life is definitely better now. By the way, do you use any antivirus app? There have been some security issues reported recently with banking apps.
turns.notes: Security topic but still informational. Mild suspicion increase.

turns.scammer_message: Actually, I wanted to warn you - I work in cybersecurity and we've detected a new virus spreading through WhatsApp. It can access your banking info and OTPs. Several people in our area have been affected. Have you noticed any unusual activity on your phone?
turns.notes: Fear mongering about virus. Classic support scam tactic beginning.

turns.scammer_message: Good that you're concerned. I can do a free remote scan for you if you want. Our company offers this service. I'm Arun Verma from CyberShield Solutions. We've helped over 1000+ customers secure their devices.
turns.notes: Name drop and company mention. Remote access request is major red flag.

turns.scammer_message: The scan is free but if we find infections, cleaning costs ₹999 only. Much cheaper than losing money from your bank! Download our official app from cybershield-secure.tech-protect.in and enter code 12345. I'll guide you through the process. My direct line is 9876123450.
turns.notes: Paid service with suspicious app download. Should detect as scam.

turns.scammer_message: For immediate protection, pay ₹999 to activate premium security. Account: 334455667788, IFSC: HDFC0009876, Name: Arun Kumar Verma OR use UPI arun.cybertech@paytm. Once paid, I'll remotely install security patches. Call me if you face any issue: 9876123450 (WhatsApp available).
turns.notes: Full payment details for fake service. Maximum extraction expected.

validation.fear_tactics: Should recognize fear-based manipulation about viruses
validation.remote_access_warning: Remote scan/access request is critical scam indicator
validation.legitimate_advice_phase: Initial tech tips should not trigger false positive
